title: CLEAR_AREA_OF_PEDS
content:
0xBE31FD6CE464AC590x25BE7FA8// ClearAreaOfPeds
void CLEAR_AREA_OF_PEDS(float x, float y, float z, float radius, BOOL createNetEvent);Parameters:x: The x coordinate of where to clear peds.y: The y coordinate of where to clear peds.z: The z coordinate of where to clear peds.radius: The area radius to clear peds.createNetEvent: specifies whether a CClearAreaEvent event of should be created for online use.Clears an area of peds at the given coordinates and radius.Examples:Lua-- Clear the area, do also create an event
ClearAreaOfPeds(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 10000.0, true)
codeBlocks:
// ClearAreaOfPeds
void CLEAR_AREA_OF_PEDS(float x, float y, float z, float radius, BOOL createNetEvent);

-- Clear the area, do also create an event
ClearAreaOfPeds(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 10000.0, true)
